title: Rename sidebar menu item from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard'

requirements.text: In the SidebarNav component, change the label of the first menu item from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard'.

quotes: change menu name Fan Controller Dashboard to "Dashboard" only

acceptanceCriteria: The sidebar navigation displays 'Dashboard' as the label for the first menu item.
No other menu item labels are changed.

nonGoals: Changing the page title in index.html
Modifying any other menu item labels
